mapper.select: SELECT D.no, D.dong_name, D.apt_name, D.deal_amount, D.area, D.build_year, D.deal_month, D.deal_day, D.floor, D.jibun, I.lat, I.lng FROM HOUSEDEAL D JOIN HOUSEINFO I WHERE D.apt_name = I.apt_name AND D.dong_name = I.dong_name AND D.apt_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOUSEDEAL D JOIN HOUSEINFO I WHERE D.apt_name = I.apt_name AND D.dong_name = I.dong_name AND D.apt_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT D.no, D.dong_name, D.apt_name, D.deal_amount, D.area, D.build_year, D.deal_month, D.deal_day, D.floor, D.jibun, I.lat, I.lng FROM HOUSEDEAL D JOIN HOUSEINFO I WHERE D.apt_name = I.apt_name AND D.dong_name = I.dong_name LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOUSEDEAL D JOIN HOUSEINFO I WHERE D.apt_name = I.apt_name AND D.dong_name = I.dong_name

SELECT D.no, D.dong_name, D.apt_name, D.deal_amount, D.area, D.build_year, D.deal_month, D.deal_day, D.floor, D.jibun, I.lat, I.lng FROM HOUSEDEAL D JOIN HOUSEINFO I WHERE D.apt_name = I.apt_name AND D.dong_name = I.dong_name And D.no = #{no}
